text: Stick Elliott (July 27, 1934 – November 1, 1980) was an American professional stock car racing driver. He was a driver in the NASCAR Winston Cup Series from 1962 to 1971. He was a 2009 inductee in the National Dirt Late Model Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1980 deaths Category:American racing drivers Category:NASCAR drivers
title: Stick Elliott
